formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: tons → pounds \( \text{pounds} = \text{tons} \times \text{factor} \) where factor is 2204.6226 (metric), 2000 (US), or 2240 (UK). pounds → tons \( \text{tons} = \text{pounds} \div \text{factor} \)
